message: Let's split the money 80/20, a fair start to the game!
Let's start with a more balanced split, 60/40 in my favor this time!
You're being too greedy, Bob! I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give up much more than this!
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve more. This is my best offer so far!
I'm not going to give up much more than this! You're running out of time, Bob!
I'm not going to give up yet! I think we can find a way to split it 50/50. Let's make a deal!
